entry.summary: 据 CoinDesk 报道，隐私公链 Namada 提议向 Zcash ( ZEC ) 的持有者空投其即将推出的 Namada 质押代币 (NAM)。这将是有史以来第一次直接空投给 ZEC 持有者，Namada 目标是 2023 年 5 月启动主网，之后将最终确定空投的确切时间和机制。 https://www.coindesk.com/tech/2023/04/12/new-privacy-blockchain-namada-proposes-first-ever-shielded-airdrop-to-zcash/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines

entry.title: 限制比特币矿工利益的 1751 号法案仅以一票反对获得德克萨斯州参议院的通过，这项法案旨在将参与需求响应计划（在能源需求高时减少运营而获得报酬）的比特币矿工...
entry.summary: 限制比特币矿工利益的 1751 号法案仅以一票反对获得德克萨斯州参议院的通过，这项法案旨在将参与需求响应计划（在能源需求高时减少运营而获得报酬）的比特币矿工限制在 10%，并取消该行业的税收减免。法案在成为法律前还需获得众议院批准和州长签字。（CoinDesk）https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/04/12/texas-senate-passes-bill-to-limit-bitcoin-miners-participation-in-demand-response-programs/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines

entry.summary: 吴说获悉，一比特币巨鲸地址在 4 月 12 日 19：52 向交易所 Bitfinex 发送 11000 枚比特币，约合 3.3 亿美元。该地址以 20083 美元的平均价格购买了 4.65 万枚比特币，约合 9.35 亿美元，并以 28039 美元的平均价格抛售 3.65 万枚比特币，获利超 3.9 亿美元，目前仍持有约 1 万枚比特币。

Zoomers truly NGMI
Rob Henderson: Striking evidence that Gen Z truly stands apart from Gen X and Millennials. entry.title: Here’s what’s wrong with Capo; - As a trader strong opinions, should be loosely held. - Ask yourself what would I need to see to prove me wrong? If ...
entry.summary:
Here’s what’s wrong with Capo; - As a trader strong opinions, should be loosely held. - Ask yourself what would I need to see to prove me wrong? If you don’t define your invalidation, you’re never wrong. Do you want to be right or make money? Can’t do both… https://twitter.com/CryptoCapo_/status/1637374540933103617
il Capo Of Crypto: Despite all the noise, I know that the vast majority of those who follow me are genuine and good people. And these deserve an update: This time away from Twitter has been very good and necessary. I'm totally fine, enjoying my personal life. Thank you to everyone who has shown… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1637374540933103617

entry.title: If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on ...
entry.summary:
If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on bet. Because of tweet, people buy Bitcoin moving price up 1%. He pockets $2m. https://twitter.com/balajis/status/1636797265317867520
Balaji: I will take that bet. You buy 1 BTC. I will send $1M USD. This is ~40:1 odds as 1 BTC is worth ~$26k. The term is 90 days. All we need is a mutually agreed custodian who will still be there to settle this in the event of digital dollar devaluation. If someone knows how to do this… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1636797265317867520 https://t.co/6Aav9KeJpe
